definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: An ergodic recursive Algorithm is suggested for the analyse of the reliability of distribution grid.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种分析配电网供电可靠性的遍历递归算法。

sentences.english: Consult personal sites only when you are convinced of their reliability.
sentences.chinese: 只有在您确信个人网站的可靠性后才能利用它们。

sentences.english: Optical Localizer have the very high accuracy and reliability, but very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 光学立体定位仪精度高，可靠性强，但是价格昂贵。

sentences.english: The semi-Markov process theory can be used to analyze the reliability of the system on this condition.
sentences.chinese: 但可以利用半马尔可夫过程理论分析系统的可靠性。

sentences.english: Reliability issues aside, there’s a deeper principle at stake here.
sentences.chinese: 先不提可靠性的问题，这里面有一个更深层的原则。

sentences.english: At last, suggestions for improving the makeup reliability of PSC connection are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 对关于提高PSC接头上扣可靠性问题提出几点建议。

sentences.english: Besides, simplify the circuit, improve dependability of the stabilizer and interference-free ability .
sentences.chinese: 同时，简化电路，提高减摇鳍的可靠性和抗干扰能力。

sentences.english: Channel coding is a fundamental method to improve the communication reliability.
sentences.chinese: 信道编码是提高通信的可靠性的必要手段。

sentences.english: Good reliability-It takes advantage of fieldbus technique and error code test function.
sentences.chinese: 高可靠性，它采用了现场总线技术并有误码效验功能。

sentences.english: Patrol regularly for all the gas stations, ensure the safety and reliable of operation.
sentences.chinese: 定期巡检气站，保证运行的安全和可靠性。

sentences.english: E1 error-free transmission device, called EFTD, is then developed for this purpose.
sentences.chinese: E1上的无差错传输设备就是为系统可靠性服务的。

sentences.english: Simple and compact structure, high reliability, electrical components imported components.
sentences.chinese: 结构紧凑简单，可靠性高，电器元件采用进口元件。

sentences.english: This will slow down the performance, but ensure reliability.
sentences.chinese: 这会降低性能，但确保了可靠性。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the credibility of the miniature medicine release capsule and the remote control device.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证微型药物释放胶囊及遥控装置的可靠性。

sentences.english: However, the crack detection rate and reliability of these methods need further study.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这些方法的裂纹检出率和可靠性需要深入研究。

sentences.english: The keypress has convenient installation and high reliability.
sentences.chinese: 该按键安装方便且可靠性高。
